apps.name: Channels
apps.subtitle: Watch live TV & events for free with Channels
apps.versionDescription:
• UI enhancements
• Updated Events tab
• 'Open in VLC' support (if VLC app is installed)
• Browser streams will open in default player if possible
• Smoother loading experience
• Bugfixes
apps.localizedDescription:
Channels allow to watch live TV & sport events for free on your iPhone, iPad or iPod Touch.
Features you will love:

• Daily live events for NBA, NFL, Soccer, UFC and more
• Categorized live TV channels
• Daily updated Movies & TV Shows

 Follow @channelstheapp on Twitter for more information.

news.title: Channels now available on AltStore!
news.caption: Live TV you're used to, better.
